dataaccess

Class ProductRowDataGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway

  • public class ProductRowDataGateway
extends java.lang.Object
    An in-memory representation of a row gateway for a product.
    Version:
    1.1 (4/10/2014)
    Author:
    fmartins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductRowDataGateway(int prodCod, java.lang.String description, double faceValue, double qty, boolean eligibleForDiscount, int unitId)
      Creates a in-memory representation of a product given its product code, description, face value, quantity in stock, discount eligibility, and the units in which the quantity is expressed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductRowDataGateway

        public ProductRowDataGateway(int prodCod,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             double faceValue,
                             double qty,
                             boolean eligibleForDiscount,
                             int unitId)
        Creates a in-memory representation of a product given its product code, description, face value, quantity in stock, discount eligibility, and the units in which the quantity is expressed.
        Parameters:
        prodCod - The product's code
        description - The description of the product
        faceValue - The value the product is sold
        qty - The number of units available in stock
        eligibleForDiscount - If the product is eligible for discount
        unitId - The units in which the quantity of the product is expressed in

    • Method Detail

      • getProductId

        public int getProductId()
        Comment: the product id is an internal (persistence) concept only used to link entities and must not have any business meaning. Also, there is no setProductId, since the id does not change through the execution of the program.
        Returns:
        The product's id

      • getProdCod

        public int getProdCod()
        Comment: there is a business rule to not allow product code changes. That is why there is no method for updating the product code.
        Returns:
        The code of the product.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        The product's description.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Updates the product's description.
        Parameters:
        description - The new description for the product

        Updates the product's stock quantity

        qty - The new stock quantity

      • isEligibleForDiscount

        public boolean isEligibleForDiscount()
        Notice that the setter and the getter convert the string to a boolean value that is then used in the application's domain logic.
        Returns:
        whether the product is eligible for discount

      • setEligibleForDiscount

        public void setEligibleForDiscount(boolean eligibleForDiscount)
        Updates the eligibility condition of a product.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getProductByCode

        public static java.util.Optional<ProductRowDataGateway> getProductByCode(int prodCod)
        Finds a product with prodCod and returns its ProductRowGateway, in case it exists (Optional).
        Parameters:
        prodCod - The code of the product to find
        Returns:
        The ProductRowGateway of the product with a given prodCod, in case it exists; otherwise it returns an empty optional value.

      • getProductById

        public static ProductRowDataGateway getProductById(int prodId)
                                            throws RecordNotFoundException
        Finds a product given its id and returns its ProductRowGateway. Raises a RecordNotFoundException in case the id is no found. See comment in CustomerRowDataGateway.getCustomerById method.
        Parameters:
        prodId - The id of the product to find
        Returns:
        The ProductRowGateway of the product with a given id
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - When the product with the given is id not found.

      • updateStockValue

        public void updateStockValue()
        Updates the stock value
